solution_line_template: They collected ${bronze_total} from Bronze Status families because {num_bronze} times {bronze_amt} equals <<{num_bronze}*{bronze_amt}={bronze_total}>>{bronze_total}.
They collected ${silver_total} from Silver Status families because {num_silver} times {silver_amt} equals <<{num_silver}*{silver_amt}={silver_total}>>{silver_total}.
They collected ${gold_total} from Gold Status families because {num_gold} times {gold_amt} equals {gold_total}.

Therefore, they collected ${collected_so_far} thus far because {bronze_total} plus {silver_total} plus {gold_total} equals <<{bronze_total}+{silver_total}+{gold_total}={collected_so_far}>>{collected_so_far}.
They need to collect ${amount_needed} more because {goal} minus {collected_so_far} equals {amount_needed}.
